title: Regret Message
lyrics: Machi hazure no chii sana mina to Hi tori ta tazumu shou jo Kono umi ni mukashi kara a ru Hi sokana ii tsuta e "Ne gai wo kaita youhishi wo" "Ko bin ni ire te" "Umi ni na gaseba itsu no hi ka" "Omo i wa minoru de shou" (lên 3/2 cung => lên ) Nagarete iku GARASU no kobin Negai wo kome ta MESSEEJI Suiheisen no kanata ni Shizuka ni kieteku (xuống 3/2 cung => về lại ) Kimi wa itsumo watashi no tame ni Nandemo shite kureta no ni Watashi wa itsumo wagamama bakari Kimi wo komarase teta Negai wo kanaete kureru kimi Mou inai kara Kono umi ni watashi no omoi Todokete morau no (lên 3/2 cung => lên ) Nagarete iku chiisana negai Namida to sukoshi no RIGURETTO Tsumi ni kizuku no wa itsumo Subete owatta ato Nagarete iku GARASU no kobin Negai wo kome ta MESSEEJI Suiheisen no kanata ni Shizuka ni kieteku Nagarete iku chiisana negai Namida to sukoshi no RIGURETTO
